name: ecmascript-modules
_comment_type: This tells Node.js to use ECMAScript module syntax (import/export) in all files inside the 'ecmascript-modules' folder. It doesn't affect files outside this folder unless they also have their own 'package.json' with 'type': 'module'.
_comment_test: This is a placeholder script for running tests. Replace it with a real test script.
_comment_keywords: Used to categorize and improve the project's visibility on npm.
